HomePage.readAgreement: I have read and agree to

notification.title: Notification
notification.description: Please read and check the box before confirming.

reminder.tips1: 1. Please make sure the ticket information is correct.
reminder.tips2: 2. Online ticket booking for shuttle buses closes at 8:00 PM the day before.
reminder.tips3: 3. The estimated travel time from Kinmen Pier to the airport is 15-20 minutes. To avoid affecting your trip, ensure there is at least a 90-minute interval between flight arrival and departure times. Plan your trip carefully and allow enough time for check-in, baggage drop-off, and security procedures. Any inconvenience or loss caused by insufficient time will be borne by the passenger.
reminder.tips4: 4. Online ticket refunds are available up to 90 minutes before the departure time.
reminder.tips5: 5. Tickets are valid only on the day of the trip. Unused tickets will be automatically refunded to the original payment channel within 3-5 business days.

PopUpRules.general_ticket: 1. General Ticket: 30 TWD, applicable to passengers occupying a regular seat.
PopUpRules.infant_ticket: 2. Infant Ticket: Free, applicable to passengers under 2 years old.
PopUpRules.notice: 1. Please read the 'Shuttle Bus Ticket Purchase Notice' carefully before purchasing tickets.
PopUpRules.real_info: 2. Please ensure all information provided is accurate and valid to avoid delays in your journey.
PopUpRules.online_deadline: 3. Online ticket sales close at 8:00 PM the day before departure.
PopUpRules.refund_deadline: 4. Online ticket refunds close 90 minutes before departure.
PopUpRules.ticket_validity: 5. Tickets are valid only on the day of departure. Unused tickets will be automatically refunded to the original payment method within 3-5 business days.
PopUpRules.contact: 6. For inquiries, please contact Ms. Lu (Phone: 0910122683, WeChat: km0910122683).
PopUpRules.process: 1. Passengers taking the shuttle bus are advised to refer to the 'Shuttle Process and Schedule.'
PopUpRules.safety: 2. To ensure safety, passengers are prohibited from bringing weapons or other contraband onto the bus. Passengers are responsible for any legal liabilities.
PopUpRules.valuables: 3. Please carry your valuables with you and keep them safe.
PopUpRules.insurance: 4. Tickets include passenger insurance coverage of up to 1.5 million TWD.
PopUpRules.invoice: 5. To request an invoice, please contact Ms. Lu in advance (Phone: 0910122683, WeChat: km0910122683). Invoices can be collected from the shuttle staff upon arrival in Kinmen.
